words.source: H8048; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'Shammah' (proper name, father of Jonathan)
H2043; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'the Hararite' (definite descriptor of Shammah's origin)
H279; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'Ahiam' (proper name of another warrior)
H1121; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'son' (connects Sharar to Ahiam; also used for Shammah earlier)
H8325; KJV: 'Sharar', ESV/NASB: 'Sacar' (variant proper name, father of Ahiam)
H2043; KJV/ESV/NASB: 'the Hararite' (definite descriptor of Sharar/Ahiam's origin)
